TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but by not explaining what you wish of him, you inenvertintly kill him.

I wish M. Wolfy corrupts my wish.

Granted but he was eaten by the space Kraken first.

I wish sprouts tasted of mushrooms.

Granted mushrooms now taste of sprouts.

I wish to be an Oompa Loompa.

Granted,but nobody will listen to them anymore.

i wish I could fly.

Granted, but you lose the ability when you are flying at 10000m.

I wish a Solar Panel.

Granted, but the kerbals used you as toilet paper.

I wish I the space kraken.

Granted, but no one likes you anymore and you forget the English/kerbal language.

I wish I wasn't a star trek fan

Granted, you are now a Homestuck fan

I wish the Drawception people knew what Homestuck is

Granted, but they are not fans of it.

I wish for more KSP/MLP crossovers.

Granted, but Pinkie Pie demanded to be on EVERY launch so Jeb was stuck at the KSC while Bill, Bob and Pinkie went off into space.

I wish Kerbals took over Earth (and all humans were dead).

Granted, they get stuck sending junk into LEO

I wish I was a spaceship Captain

Granted. It's a suicide mission into a black hole.

I wish for .22 to come out.

Granted, but Squad decides to end all development there.

I wish for a non-corruptible wish.

Granted, but you die before that wish is granted

I wish to live in a colony on Duna

Granted, but you are the only thing living there so you go insane and die.

I wish KSP devs can work faster and better (I want 0.22 now!)

Granted.

But,since no rocket are capable of returning from Duna, you have to stay there until you die.

I wish I could make good plugins.

Granted, but people start hating you by jalousy

I wish every fictional charachter ever created were in the same room

Granted, but the room is fictional.

I wish Aperture Science was a real company.

granted but your a test subject and GLADoS is as crazy and homicidal as ever

I wish i didn't have school tomorrow

Granted, but you do have it for the rest of your life!

I wish I didn't just subject a person to school for their whole life

granted instead you just subjected YOURSELF to schhol for the rest of your life

I wish i had a face

Granted, but this happens:

I wish for a pie. Pumpkin, preferably.

A hobo steals it shortly after.

I wish for a Red Pikmin butler.

granted but its crawling with maggots and you ate a slice because you didn't notice >

i wish i was a kerbal

Granted, but then -explosions-

I wish people wouldn't wish for things on a forum for a space simulation game.
